Actions.Name: Axe Kick
Actions.Effects: Becomes a critical hit (+[D]) against bloodied foes.

Actions.Name: Hurl Boulder
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 takes [fray] damage, is slowed, and is shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Izuna Drop
Actions.Description: The Yamen takes a pose, then gains
Actions.Delay: Their next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, they may dash 2. Then, if a foe is adjacent, they may remove themselves and that foe from the battlefield, then places both of them back in free spaces adjacent to each other in range 3. The foe is stunned and takes 2[D]+[fray].
